products.name: Matera
products.description: Matera 3 Seater Sofa Daino Leather Treacle
products.longDescription: Matera is a masterclass in contemporary design; clean lines, metal legs and expert upholstery make the design a timeless classic.

longMaterial.SeatCushion: High density polyurethane foam, memory foam and feathers
longMaterial.BackCushion: Mollapiuma mix of feather and polyurethane
longMaterial.Upholstery: Available in a range of Daino Leathers, Nobilis Velvets and St Moritz Wools
